menuView

Class LoadGamePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • menuView.LoadGamePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class LoadGamePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class creates the Load Game Panel, and generates all GUI elements within the panel. This includes a list of all saved games for the current user, as well as information (save name, level, date saved) about the highlighted saved game. Buttons for navigation include "Load Game", which will generate the appropriate gameContext, and "Return" which will return the user to the previous menu. Load Game can be accessed from the Pause Menu or Main Menu.
    Author:
    Eric Liou
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
